freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate:
<#list rows as row> <#assign id>${row["id"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign drugCategory>${row["drug_category"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign alignment>${row["alignment"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign variationRef>${row["variationRef"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign variationFeature>${row["variationFeature"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign variationName>${row["variationName"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign guidelines>${row["guidelines"]?trim}</#assign>
create custom-table-row drug_resistance_official_guidance "${id}" custom-table-row drug_resistance_official_guidance "${id}" set link-target drug_category "custom-table-row/drug_category/${drugCategory}" set link-target alignment "alignment/${alignment}" set link-target variation "reference/${variationRef}/feature-location/${variationFeature}/variation/${variationName}" exit
<#if guidelines != ""> <#list guidelines?split(",") as guideline> create custom-table-row drug_guidance_guideline "${id}_${guideline}" custom-table-row drug_guidance_guideline "${id}_${guideline}" set link-target drug_guideline "custom-table-row/drug_guideline/${guideline}" set link-target drug_resistance_official_guidance "custom-table-row/drug_resistance_official_guidance/${id}" exit </#list> </#if>
</#list>
